title: THE LAG SPIKEZ
body: Recently, I have been experiencing EXTREMELY ANNOYING lag spikes even though my internet is completely fine. when I walk towards lane, everything is smooth but when there's an enemy champion or when I farm it starts to lag like crazy. And no I don't use skype or curse when I play.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Can you give me a bit more detail? *Lag* is often used as a catch-all for all kinds of issues. Do you notice any change in your latency (ping) or FPS when this happens? Any "attempting to reconnect" messages?
